title: Camp WeWow Magic Week Day 3
description:
It's Magic Week at Camp WeWow! Today, we're learning about refraction!! Visit tinkercast.com/resource/activity-magic-drawing for directions to today's activity and share what you're tinkering with at tinkercast.com/share! What's your favorite Camp WeWow memory?! Call us at 1-888-7WOW-WOW to share what you've loved about Camp WeWow! You just might get featured around the Camp WeWow Campfire this Friday!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
